DOC.brief_summary: This study involves telephone surveys of parents of young urban children with and without asthma to assess attitudes about smoking including personal smoking bans in their homes and cars, and beliefs about public policies regarding smoking.
DOC.brief_title: Attitudes About Smoking: A Telephone Survey
DOC.criteria: Child with asthma OR a matched child without asthma from the Rochester City School District Nonenglish speaking family / parent
